title: I do not want this  LEAGUE CLIENT BETA MOD !!!!
body:
Guys how can i  remove this League client beta file? I want my League of Legends to open in old (I mean Normal) not as a new league client beta UPGRADE ? so can you help me   


If i have Misspellings sry im really bad english is that from Google tranlsate XD :)

replies.body:
If you want to stop the slow upgrade download go to :

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system   folder

edit the user.cfg file

leagueClientOptIn = no

Save the file and start the game.
Thank you so much. that solved the issue. <3
ty its work

Well i tried it...and nothing changes.

there was no "leagueClientOptIn" in the doc so i added it. still nothing.  what is does say it "disableP2P = False" what do i do with this???
How do you edit it ?
i wanna stop the upgrade cause internet is shit and its taking forever and starting over so i cant even launch the game.
Same. and it keep crashing over and over and i can't stop this download how do you fix this ?

> [{quoted}](name=GODXORO,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jbiWlKVd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:35:26.493+0000)

> [{quoted}](name=GODXORO,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jbiWlKVd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:35:26.493+0000)
>
> i wanna stop the upgrade cause internet is shit and its taking forever and starting over so i cant even launch the game.

THIS ^

You can continue using the legacy client if you don't want to participate in the open beta.  Return to the login screen and select launch legacy client under the Sign In button.  You can also launch it manually by selecting lol.launcher via your League of Legends folder.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jbiWlKVd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-16T18:15:15.633+0000)
>
> You can continue using the legacy client if you don't want to participate in the open beta.  Return to the login screen and select launch legacy client under the Sign In button.  You can also launch it manually by selecting lol.launcher via your League of Legends folder.
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

You know its for time do you?  When the launcher is official you will cant play with old launcher only with new.  I dont like it too because I cant start game -_- ;(

Thanks for replying. I'd like to note this only works if the beta client is booting you or crashing for whatever reason.
I recently had to dig through my "Riot Games" folder until I found an exe that would launch the old client. The beta was telling me I couldn't connect and leaving me with no options other than restart and shutdown, unless I used TAB to fill out the username & pass, at which point it would boot me at the home page for the same issue.
To be absolutely clear, the old client worked fine, but I couldn't even click on it because of the "failed connection" dialogue.
tyyyyy <3 it worked this beta client is too laggy in the champ select for me {{item:3070}} {{summoner:6}}
This doesn't help at all since there is no way to log in unless the update is finished!! ;(
I laged in champion select a lot in this new client so i have to play the old one rip it looks soo dam cool but my computer/internet is bad haha
but what do you do if you can't get to the log-in screen after running every possible deploy folders launcher (normally and admin)?

TO LAUNCH YOUR OLD CLIENT WITHOUT REINSTALL :
Open with NotePad : League of Legends\RADS\system\user.cfg
Second line :
leagueClientOptIn = yes
change : leagueClientOptIn = yes to "no"
and there you go :-)
thanks so much <333

I LOVE YOU BRO. KAPPA PROUD FOR U

I was able to get to where it says leagueclientoptin=yes but i could not change the yes to no
having same issue, download is slow as hell and then i get a random error also...i do not have access or cannot find the file to change it to stop updating
I have the same issue I would like to stop the upgrade into open beta. I instantly regretted my decision to upgrade.

how do you do this on a mac

All you have to is to close the game and reopen it, then you have to go to the login screen DON'T LOGIN look at the bottom it should say open legacy edition or something like that and BAM! it should be back to normal
